ygData.subject: RE: Lyssa's Voracious Concord
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Heh, try playing as a human some time.  My monk literally is blind as a bat at night.  I died once in Butcherblock, appeared in Kelethin, and stupidly
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> Forgot about the see invis. No I haven't figured that out about lightstones
> actually since I'm a wood elf, and my cleric is a gnome, and... You get the
> picture.

Heh, try playing as a human some time. My monk literally is
blind as a bat at night. I died once in Butcherblock,
appeared in Kelethin, and stupidly decided to make the run
back without pulling the spare lightstone from the bank. All
he could see were vague light/dark shades, and I spent 20
minutes groping around the trees in Greater Faydark hoping I
could stumble across the zone.

The range on the song is huge - as big as Accelerando. So if
you have humans in the group and are running across a large
zone at night, you can weave it with Accelerando.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
